item.description: Node.js allows developers to write their server-side applications in JavaScript and it looks like Microsoft has kept all the essentials in place. item.title: Disadvantages to using "associative arrays" in JavaScript ...
item.description: I'm working with some people are are used to making "associative arrays" in JavaScript like this: var arr = new Array(); arr.prop_1 = "asdf";. or arr['prop 2'] ... actually doing is monkey patching an object. People use objects as maps often - but that'll get fixed soon since ES6 (the new version of the standard JS is based on) has Map types. ... array - best practices? question feed. lang-js. about help badges blog chat data legal privacy policy jobs advertising info mobile contact us feedback ...
